fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check a player for having paid their taxes.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target refused to have their taxes collected by the Tax Collector, you will attack them.
- You may not know the contents of whispers directed towards you, for they are last in bureaucratic hell.
- When rolled, the Tax Collector is also autorolled. This may not roll in role lists where the Tax Collector and IRS Agent may not exist together.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Smite all who refuse to pay the Tax Collector's taxes.
